numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In some places, many younger people think that the world is getting better.
3. In some places, fewer people over 40 think that the world is getting better.
4. I wonder why the opposite is not true.
6. In the U.S., people are more supportive of other people.
7. In the U.S., people are more inclusive of other people.
8. The headline is: Where is the World Going.
